attributes.action: Hold a referendum on whether the UK remains a member of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the people of the UK were conned into voting for the common market as just being a trading agreement 'with no loss of sovereignty' and we have traded at a loss and been ruled from Brussels since first joining up, I would like to see a referendum to let the people decide if they want to remain members of the EU.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
